    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:24.559
    | text      = So he's not into that sort of freedom stuff, which puts him diametrically opposed to George

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:49.539
    | text      = The Aurora Center is a Jewish charity organization in Hungary, and they'd been aligned with Soros
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:55.019

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:57.980
    | text      = And I'd like you to listen to this passage from an article in The Guardian and see if
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:01.059
    | text      = you hear anything you find familiar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:02.920
    | text      = Quote, the Aurora Center was set up in 2014 and acts as a kind of coalition of the vulnerable,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:08.119
    | text      = housing the offices of non-governmental organizations that work on Jewish issues, Roma issues, LGBT
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:16.360
    | text      = The proceeds from an on-site bar and regular concerts go to support the running of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:20.360
    | text      = space, and the center's initial funding came partially from Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:25.280
    | text      = Last month, a group of far-right activists defaced the outside of the building, spray
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:29.059
    | text      = painting Stop Operation Soros on the pavement and plastering photographs of his face with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:34.840
    | text      = a red cross stuck through it on the doorway, which is undoubtedly a coincidence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:39.719
    | text      = In 2018, Orban's government passed a law called Literally Stop Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:44.579
    | text      = It's called Stop Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:45.579
    | text      = The Literally Stop Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:46.579
    | text      = Not Literally Stop Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:47.579
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Gotcha.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:52.579

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:54.579
    | text      = These Stop Soros laws literally restricted non-governmental organizations from being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:00.019
    | text      = able to assist immigrants in asylum cases.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:03.079

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:41:06.199

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:27.079
    | text      = What we need to do is find out who, as a government, had anti-Soros positions before that point
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:30.639
    | text      = so we can see who Alex is talking about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:42.099
    | text      = Oh, I'm sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:43.099
    | text      = This goes all the way back to Velma Palm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:45.880
    | text      = From a November 7th, 2003 article in the BBC, quote, camouflage-clad men have forced staff
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:51.699
    | text      = to leave the Moscow offices of the Open Society Institute founded by U.S. billionaire George
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:57.320
    | text      = At least 30 men stormed the offices and seized computers and documents in the raid, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:01.280
    | text      = began late on Thursday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:03.440
    | text      = The state was claiming that it was about Open Society not paying their rent, but that doesn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:07.900
    | text      = explain why the camouflaged men took what was described as, quote, two lorry loads of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:12.820
    | text      = documents after their raid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:14.679
    | text      = That just doesn't make sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:16.000
    | text      = Look, I didn't pay my rent for a while, and my landlord, of course, hired two dozen camouflaged
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:22.920
    | text      = men to steal my computer and then rummage through it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:26.280
    | text      = Value access to your servers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:27.760
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:28.760
    | text      = That was their whole plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:29.880
    | text      = What this was really about was Soros and Open Society, they were open about how the arrest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:34.639
    | text      = of Yukos Oil CEO Mikhail Khodorski, Khodorski, I'm not good at this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:41.320
    | text      = Khodorski?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:42.320
    | text      = Khodorski by Putin was a clear instance of corruption in an attempt to jail his political
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:47.039
    | text      = opponents.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:48.039
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:49.039
    | text      = Putin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:50.039
    | text      = Because Khodorski was definitely one of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:51.039
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:52.039
    | text      = He'd spent tons of money establishing educational programs, setting up journalist training initiatives
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:55.880
    | text      = and founding internet cafes where normal people could have access to and communicate with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:00.199
    | text      = the outside world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:01.199
    | text      = He was arrested and jailed on trumped up charges, ultimately doing about 10 years in jail before
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:06.000
    | text      = international outcry led to Putin pardoning him in 2014, after which point he wisely headed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:11.119
    | text      = out to the UK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:12.119
    | text      = Smart.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:13.119
    | text      = Get out of there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:14.119
    | text      = Yeah, that was a good move.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:15.119
    | text      = That was a good move.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:16.119
    | text      = Soros was one of the people speaking up about this case, and in retaliation, Putin raided
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:20.239
    | text      = his offices and made it impossible for him to operate within the country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:24.019
    | text      = In that time period, Soros was very clear about his opposition to Putin's government,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:28.440
    | text      = writing an op-ed for CNN in 2009 that said, quote, the new order in Moscow that has emerged
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:33.480
    | text      = out of the chaos of the 1990s is very far from an open society.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:37.719
    | text      = It's an authoritarian regime that preserves an outward appearance of democracy, but derives
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:42.079
    | text      = its power from its control of Russia's national resources.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:47.099
    | text      = It uses those resources to maintain itself in power, to personally enrich the rulers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:51.719
    | text      = and exercise influence over its neighborhood, both in Europe and the former Soviet sphere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:57.760
    | text      = But the ideal of an open society is difficult to suppress, and I have not given up hope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:02.840
    | text      = In the period following the 2003 raid, Putin continued to express his hostility towards
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:07.079
    | text      = Soros and his democratic initiatives, blaming him for many of the things that the rest of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:11.559
    | text      = the world views as Putin's own aggression, be it the Georgian war in 2008 or the annexation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:16.559
    | text      = of Crimea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:17.559
    | text      = Soros.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:18.559
    | text      = Interestingly, on February 23rd, 2009, which is, I don't know, about a month before the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:24.519
    | text      = episode we're listening to right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:25.920
    | text      = February 23rd, 2009, those two dates really seem close together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:31.159
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:32.159
    | text      = George Soros wrote an article for the European Council on Foreign Relations that was very
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:35.119
    | text      = overt in its message about Putin's Russia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:37.760
    | text      = Here are some choice passages.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:39.199
    | text      = Quote, Europe cannot afford to not resist Russia's geopolitical aggression, and it needs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:47.239
    | text      = to be unified to have any chance of success.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:50.320
    | text      = Europe needs to pursue a two-pronged strategy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:52.860
    | text      = On the one hand, it must protect itself against the geopolitical threat posed by a newly assertive
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:57.440
    | text      = and adventurous Russia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:59.079
    | text      = On the other, it must seek to replace the rule of force with the rule of law, and geopolitics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:03.599
    | text      = with the pursuit of democracy, open society, and international cooperation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:08.119
    | text      = Strengthening and supporting the former Soviet republics would serve both prongs of a unified
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:12.599
    | text      = EU policy towards Russia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:14.940
    | text      = In the op-ed, Soros advocates for the strategy of establishing a, quote, unified energy policy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:20.000
    | text      = with a Europe-wide regulatory authority, which has precedence over national regulators and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:27.280
    | text      = a Europe-wide distribution network.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:29.480
    | text      = This would deprive Russia of its ability to play one country against another because a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:33.380
    | text      = concession granted to one national distributor would immediately become available to customers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:39.079
    | text      = in all other countries, which is reflecting the reality of what Russia had done previous
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:44.300
    | text      = to this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:45.300
    | text      = Oh, do you mean picking them off one by one in order to...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:48.199
    | text      = Well, and also playing with their oil reserves in order to manipulate countries that relied
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:53.679
    | text      = on those sorts of things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:55.079
    | text      = How long has Putin been in power for now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:57.360
    | text      = It's got to be 30 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:58.360
    | text      = Since December 31st, 1999.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:01.480
    | text      = So it's...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:02.480
    | text      = He took over on New Year's Day, 1999.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = It takes on a very different feel in that context.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:35.619
    | text      = But all that is good and well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:36.880
    | text      = But what really interests me about this interview is who is interviewing Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:42.159
    | text      = The interview is being done by a woman named Anastasia Cherkina, who is a prominent journalist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:47.300
    | text      = at RT for a while.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:48.960
    | text      = However, in addition to being a reporter, she's also the daughter of Vitality Cherkin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:53:54.819
    | text      = You may remember him from earlier as Russia's ambassador to the UN, who is saying that Russia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:00.300
    | text      = would deploy their missiles if the US put their radar station in the Czech Republic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:05.380
    | text      = Huh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:06.380
    | text      = Weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:07.380
    | text      = Huh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:08.380
    | text      = Cherkin had been a prominent member of Russia's foreign relations team and the permanent representative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:16.880
    | text      = of Russia at the UN since April 2006.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:19.699
    | text      = And in his time there, he's most known for being quick with the wit and even quicker
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:25.439
    | text      = to veto UN resolutions that went counter to Russia's interests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:29.220
    | text      = In the time span that he was at the UN, he was the one to veto 13 resolutions, many of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:34.479
    | text      = which were about human rights abuses in Syria, a few others about Georgia and Ukraine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:39.180
    | text      = In the same time frame, the US vetoed three resolutions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:42.659
    | text      = Before becoming Russia's main man at the UN, Vitality Cherkin had a storied resume, having
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:48.779
    | text      = risen up from the US desk at the USSR foreign ministry in the late 70s to becoming the ambassador
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:54.579
    | text      = to Belgium and Canada in the early to late 90s and early 2000s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:54:59.619
    | text      = My point here is that Vitality Cherkin is a big player in Russian international politics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:04.760
    | text      = and foreign relations, and it seems like a stretch of credulity to imagine that Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:09.659
    | text      = wouldn't know who he is, given the fact that Cherkin was a naysayer within the body that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:14.539
    | text      = Alex hates the most, the United Nations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:17.539
    | text      = I find it very unlikely that he wouldn't know that he was being interviewed by such a high-ranking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:22.159
    | text      = international relations figure's daughter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:24.960
    | text      = I don't think that's possible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:27.539
    | text      = The only way that it's not possible is that Alex has no idea about the worlds he pretends
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:33.039
    | text      = to know about, which I accept is possible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:36.619
    | text      = Let's pump the brakes on that one real quick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:39.779
    | text      = Look, I respect that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:41.579

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:47.859
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:48.859
    | text      = Now, you might also remember Vitality Cherkin is one of the prominent Russian officials
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:55:58.420

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:56:19.140
    | text      = That's totally fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:56:20.140

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:56:27.060

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:57:15.340

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:57:17.920

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:57:23.659

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's just suspicious, and it doesn't prove anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:57:42.659
    | text      = I sincerely don't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
